mapper.select: SELECT Repairs.repairID, Customers.customerId, Customers.firstName, Customers.lastName, Customers.address, Customers.phone, Devices.deviceId, Devices.deviceType, Devices.brand, Employees.employeeId, Employees.firstName, Employees.lastName,Employees.address,Employees.phone, Employees.sector, Employees.salary,Employees.hireDate, Services.serviceId,Services.serviceType, Services.servicePrice,Repairs.repairDate FROM Repairs LEFT JOIN Customers ON Repairs.customerId = Customers.customerId LEFT JOIN Employees ON Repairs.employeeId = Employees.employeeId LEFT JOIN Devices ON Repairs.deviceId = Devices.deviceId LEFT JOIN Services ON Repairs.serviceId = Services.serviceId WHERE Repairs.repairId = #{repairId};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO RepairService.Repairs (customerId, employeeId, serviceId, deviceId, RepairDate) VALUES (#{customerId}, #{employeeId}, #{serviceId}, #{deviceId}, #{RepairDate})
